Description: Diameters of all trees <8 cm were measured in two perpendicular directions using calipers and averaged. Diameters of larger trees were calculated from their circumferences. X pi/4 yields the cross section areas. Diameters were measured at 1/10th of tree height, except for large buttressed trees for which diameter was measured above the buttress.
Height from stem base to the centre of the highest leaf and from stem base to the lowest leaf.
Width in two perpendicular directions x pi/4.
Understory or gaps in tropical forests. Nearly all trees were in old-growth tropical forest.
